get.summary: Returns all Disputes from the Oracle Data API with optional exclusion parameter to exclude disputes having specified status from the result.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

get.summary: Returns a single Dispute with the given identifier from the Oracle Data API.

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific Dispute record.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

put.summary: Updates a single Dispute through the Oracle Data Interface API based on unique dispute id and the dispute data being passed in the body.

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific Dispute record.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: The Dispute to update was not found.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to REJECTED.

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific Dispute record to cancel.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to REJECTED iff status is NEW, CANCELLED, VALIDATED or REJECTED and the rejected reason must be <= 256 characters. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to VALIDATED.

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific Dispute record to validate.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to VALIDATED iff status is NEW. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular Dispute record to CANCELLED.

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific Dispute record to cancel.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute status can only be set to CANCELLED iff status is NEW, VALIDATED, REJECTED or PROCESSING.Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: An endpoint for resending an email to a Disputant.

500.description: Server Error

put.summary: Submits a Dispute record, setting it's status to PROCESSING

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific Dispute record to submit.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: Dispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A Dispute can only be submitted if the status is NEW or is already set to PROCESSING. Update failed.

409.description: The Dispute has already been assigned to a different user. Dispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Approves a DisputantUpdateRequest record, setting it's status to ACCEPTED.

parameters.name: updateStatusId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific DisputantUpdateRequest record to accept.

500.description: Server Error

put.summary: Rejects a DisputantUpdateRequest record, setting it's status to REJECTED.

parameters.name: updateStatusId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific DisputantUpdateRequest record to reject.

500.description: Server Error

get.summary: Returns all Disputes that have pending update requests from the Oracle Data API

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

get.summary: Returns all update requests for a specific dispute

parameters.name: disputeId
parameters.description: Dispute Id

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

get.summary: Returns all File History Records from the Oracle Data API related to a specific ticket number.

200.description: The File history records were found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

get.summary: Returns all File History Records from the Oracle Data API related to a specific ticket number.

200.description: The File history records were found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

get.summary: Returns all JJ Disputes from the Oracle Data API

parameters.name: jjAssignedTo
parameters.description: If specified, will retrieve the records which are assigned to the specified jj staff

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

get.summary: Returns a single JJ Dispute with the given identifier from the Oracle Data API.

parameters.name: JJDisputeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific JJ dispute record.

parameters.name: assignVTC
parameters.description: boolean to indicate need to assign VTC.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

409.description: The JJDispute has already been assigned to a user. JJDispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully or no data found.

put.summary: Updates a single JJ Dispute through the Oracle Data Interface API based on unique violation ticket number and the jj dispute data being passed in the body.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific JJ Dispute record.

parameters.name: checkVTC
parameters.description: boolean to indicate need to check VTC assigned.

200.description: Admin resolution is submitted. The JJ Dispute is updated.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: The JJ Dispute to update was not found.

405.description: An invalid JJ Dispute status is provided. Update failed.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates each JJ Dispute based on the passed in IDs (ticket number) to assign them to a specific JJ or unassign them if JJ not specified.

parameters.name: ticketNumbers
parameters.description: List of Unique identifiers for JJ Dispute records to be assigend/unassigned.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: IDIR username of the JJ that JJ Dispute(s) will be assigned to, if specified. Otherwise JJ Disputes will be unassigned.

200.description: JJ Disputes are assigned/unassigned to/from a JJ successfully. The JJ Disputes are updated.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: The JJ Dispute(s) to update was not found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular JJDispute record to REVIEW as well as adds an optional remark that explaining why the status was set to REVIEW.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific JJ Dispute record.

parameters.name: checkVTC
parameters.description: boolean to indicate need to check VTC assigned.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: JJDispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A JJDispute status can only be set to REVIEW iff status is NEW or VALIDATED and the remark must be less than or equal to 256 characters. Update failed.

409.description: The JJDispute has already been assigned to a different user. JJDispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular JJDispute record to REQUIRE_COURT_HEARING, hearing type to COURT_APPEARANCE as well as adds an optional remark that explaining why the status was set.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific JJ Dispute record.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: JJDispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A JJDispute status can only be set to REVIEW iff status is NEW or VALIDATED and the remark must be less than or equal to 256 characters. Update failed.

409.description: The JJDispute has already been assigned to a different user. JJDispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

put.summary: Updates the status of a particular JJDispute record to ACCEPTED.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a specific JJ Dispute record.

parameters.name: checkVTC
parameters.description: boolean to indicate need to check VTC assigned.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

404.description: JJDispute record not found. Update failed.

405.description: A JJDispute status can only be set to ACCEPTED iff status is CONFIRMED. Update failed.

409.description: The JJDispute has already been assigned to a different user. JJDispute cannot be modified until assigned time expires.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the update from completing successfully.

get.summary: Returns all Users with the given group name.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: A unique group name to query.

500.description: Server Error

get.summary: Returns a list of Violation Ticket Statutes filtered by given section text (if provided).

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Motor vehicle act Section text to query by, ie "13(1)(a)" returns "Motor Vehicle or Trailer without Licence" contravention, or blank for no filter.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
